channel.title: How do i change the way
channel.description: How do i change the way you hold a weapon. How the weapon attacks. How do you change the name of a weapon?? (what appears in the attack style window)) And You know how you have the 4 options of like, slash, stab, crush etc. Well how do i set a bow to the bow's original attack type??

item.title: How do i change the way
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2745)) // Godswords.
{
PkingDelay = 5;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2746)) // Godswords.
{
PkingDelay = 5;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2747)) // Godswords.
{
PkingDelay = 5;
}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (2748)) // Godswords.
{
PkingDelay = 5;
}

if((id == 2746) || (id == 2747) || (id == 2745) || (id == 2748)) // Godswords.
{
return 0x67F;
}

if((id == 2746) || (id == 2747) || (id == 2745) || (id == 2748)) // Godswords.

item.title: How do i change the way
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

public int GetWepAnim()

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == IDOFWEAPON) // NAMEOFWEAPON
{
return WHICHANIMYOUWANT;
}

public int GetStandAnim(int id)

if(id == WEAPONID) // NAME OF WEAPON
{
return WHICHANIMYOUWANT;
}
